name: RoboMatch (itch)
description:
(prerelease - no bugs founded)
Match 3 type game with mechs, shops, galaxy...
Player have armed mech. By swaping items at game field it attacks enemy mech. After player turn - enemy turn to defeat player.

Much of weapons (8 guns, 8 lasers, 8 rocket launchers)

much of additional items (63 generators, shields, armors, coolers, battaries, reloaders...)

6 player mechs and 5 enemy mechs.

83 levels.

Gameplay:

I hope you'll enjoy.
